articles.author: Amy B Wang, Seung Min Kim, Felicia Sonmez, Marianna Sotomayor
articles.content: The decision came after Sens. Tammy Duckworth (D-Ill.) and Mazie Hirono (D-Hawaii) vowed Tuesday afternoon to vote no on Bidens non-diversity Cabinet nominees until the White House addressed the issu… [+4916 chars]
articles.description: The decision came after Sens. Tammy Duckworth (D-Ill.) and Mazie Hirono (D-Hawaii) vowed to vote no on Biden’s “non-diversity” Cabinet nominees until the White House addressed their concerns about lack of Asian American and Pacific Islander representation.
articles.title: White House to add AAPI liaison after ultimatum from Sens. Duckworth, Hirono - The Washington Post
